name: Librix
description:
Librix is a tetris game where the graphical elements are made of mascots of free software applications. The name librix is a simplification of the sum of the words Libre + Bricks.

Controls

Navigating in the interface:

     Arrow keys and w,a,s,d:  move the focus of the option

     Enter:  select the actual option

     Esc:  sometimes come back to a previous screen

Playing:

      Arrow keys and w,a,s,d:  move the actual element.

      Esc: access the pause menu where you can exit the match

This is my first game. It was made in Godot Engine running on GNU/Linux. If you like this game and want to make some change this game is under MIT License.
